main event: A pencil-shaped UFO was sighted in Bismarck, North Dakota on 29 October 1957, moving fast and climbing slowly for a duration of 20 minutes.
interesting points: The UFO was described as pencil-shaped and was observed moving at high speeds and climbing slowly.
The report states that there was no photograph of the sighting.
The sighting was supported by two witnesses, including a GOC observer on duty, who estimated the object to be 44 feet thick and half a mile long.
The conclusion of the report seems to suggest that the object sighted was a standard size at approximately 30,000 feet, potentially accounting for the sighting.
The UFO report provides details of the weather conditions and altitude at the time of the sighting.
witnesses: Two witnesses, including a GOC observer on duty
